## hrp convert

convert JSON/YAML testcases to pytest/gotest scripts

```
hrp convert $path... [flags]
```

### Options

```
      --gotest   convert to gotest scripts (TODO)
  -h, --help     help for convert
      --pytest   convert to pytest scripts (default true)
```
